Plot: James Porter (Martin Lawrence) drives his teenage daughter Melanie (Raven Symone), from their home in Chicago to a college interview in Washington, D.C.
Title: College Road Trip
Writer: Emi Mochizuki, Carrie Lee Wilson, Cinco Paul, Ken Daurio
Actors: Martin Lawrence, Raven-Symoné, Kym Whitley, Adam LeFevre
tomatoConsensus: Filled with shrill gags and middling slapstick, College Road Trip is woefully short on comic imagination.
